name: AdvancedEndlessResources
title: 高级无尽资源
author: _ImPat
description: 现在所有的资源都会改变为无限的。即使原来游戏世界中资源含量已经低于50%。这个MOD的更多信息请访问mods.factorio.com
description_original: All Resources now have yields. Compatible with old worlds where ammount is already below 50. For more info and credit visit this mod on mods.factorio.com
